wikipedia_page.main: Colonel Standish Darby O'Grady, 2nd Viscount Guillamore (26 December 1792 – 22 July 1848) from Cahir Guillamore, County Limerick, was an Anglo-Irish politician and British Army officer.

response: ** Standish O'Grady, 2nd Viscount Guillamore (1792–1848) Lieutenant-Colonel in the British Army, married Gertrude-Jane, daughter of Berkeley Paget, they had two daughters.
* Standish O'Grady, 2nd Viscount Guillamore (1792–1848), Anglo-Irish politician and British Army officer
* Standish O'Grady, 2nd Viscount Guillamore, British Army officer and Waterloo veteran
*Gertrude Jane, who married the future Standish O'Grady, 2nd Viscount Guillamore.
